不定积分表证明（一）

发表于2023-04-10|更新于2023-04-15|数学
|阅读量:|评论数:

不定积分表证明（一）

含有 ax+bax+bax+b 的积分

1.∫dxax+b=1a⋅ln⁡∣ax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} 1. \int \frac{dx}{ax + b}=\frac{1}{a} \cdot \ln{\vert{ax+b}\vert} + C \\ \end{aligned} 1.∫ax+bdx​=a1​⋅ln∣ax+b∣+C​

证明：

解法1：

∫dxax+b=1a∫d(ax+b)ax+b=1a⋅ln⁡∣ax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int \frac{dx}{ax+b}&=\frac{1}{a} \int\frac{d(ax+b)}{ax+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{a} \cdot \ln{\vert{ax+b}\vert}+C \end{aligned} ∫ax+bdx​​=a1​∫ax+bd(ax+b)​=a1​⋅ln∣ax+b∣+C​

解法2：

设 ax+b=tax+b=tax+b=t 则有 dt=adxdt=adxdt=adx， dx=1adtdx=\frac{1}{a}dtdx=a1​dt

∫dxax+b=1a∫dtt=1aln⁡∣t∣+C=1aln⁡∣ax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{ax+b} &=\frac{1}{a}\int\frac{dt}{t}\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\ln\vert{t}\vert+C\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫ax+bdx​​=a1​∫tdt​=a1​ln∣t∣+C=a1​ln∣ax+b∣+C​

2.∫(ax+b)μdx=1a(μ+1)⋅(ax+b)μ+1+C  (μ≠−1)\begin{aligned} 2.\int(ax+b)^{\mu}dx=\frac{1}{a(\mu+1)}\cdot(ax+b)^{\mu+1}+C\ \ (\mu\neq-1) \end{aligned} 2.∫(ax+b)μdx=a(μ+1)1​⋅(ax+b)μ+1+C  (μ=−1)​

证明：

解法1：

∫(ax+b)μdx=1a∫(ax+b)μ d(ax+b)=(ax+b)μ+1a(μ+1)+C\begin{aligned} \int(ax+b)^{\mu}dx &= \frac{1}{a}\int(ax+b)^{\mu}\ d(ax+b)\\ &= \frac{(ax+b)^{\mu+1}}{a(\mu+1)}+C \end{aligned} ∫(ax+b)μdx​=a1​∫(ax+b)μ d(ax+b)=a(μ+1)(ax+b)μ+1​+C​

解法2：

设 ax+b=tax+b=tax+b=t 则有 dt=adxdt=adxdt=adx， dx=1adtdx=\frac{1}{a}dtdx=a1​dt

∫(ax+b)μdx=1a∫tμdt=1a⋅tμ+1μ+1+C=(ax+b)μ+1a(μ+1)+C\begin{aligned} \int(ax+b)^{\mu}dx &=\frac{1}{a}\int t^\mu dt\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\cdot\frac{t^{\mu+1}}{\mu+1}+C\\ &=\frac{(ax+b)^{\mu+1}}{a(\mu+1)}+C \end{aligned} ∫(ax+b)μdx​=a1​∫tμdt=a1​⋅μ+1tμ+1​+C=a(μ+1)(ax+b)μ+1​+C​

3.∫xax+bdx=1a2(ax+b−b⋅ln⁡∣ax+b∣)+C\begin{aligned} 3. \int\frac{x}{ax+b}dx=\frac{1}{a^2}(ax+b-b\cdot\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert)+C \end{aligned} 3.∫ax+bx​dx=a21​(ax+b−b⋅ln∣ax+b∣)+C​

证明：

解法1：

∫xax+bdx=1a∫ax+b−bax+bdx=1a∫dx−ba∫dxax+b=1a∫dx−ba2∫d(ax+b)ax+b=xa−ba2ln⁡∣ax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x}{ax+b}dx &=\frac{1}{a}\int\frac{ax+b-b}{ax+b}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\int dx-\frac{b}{a}\int\frac{dx}{ax+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\int dx-\frac{b}{a^2}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{ax+b}\\ &=\frac{x}{a}-\frac{b}{a^2}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫ax+bx​dx​=a1​∫ax+bax+b−b​dx=a1​∫dx−ab​∫ax+bdx​=a1​∫dx−a2b​∫ax+bd(ax+b)​=ax​−a2b​ln∣ax+b∣+C​

解法2：

设 ax+b=tax+b=tax+b=t 则有 dt=adxdt=adxdt=adx， dx=1adtdx=\frac{1}{a}dtdx=a1​dt ，x=t−bax=\frac{t-b}{a}x=at−b​

∫xax+bdx=∫t−batdta=1a2∫t−btdt=1a2∫dt−ba2∫dtt=ta2−ba2ln⁡∣t∣+C=ax+ba2−ba2ln⁡∣ax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x}{ax+b}dx &=\int\frac{\frac{t-b}{a}}{t}\frac{dt}{a}\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{t-b}{t}dt\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int dt-\frac{b}{a^2}\int\frac{dt}{t}\\ &=\frac{t}{a^2}-\frac{b}{a^2}\ln\vert{t}\vert+C\\ &=\frac{ax+b}{a^2}-\frac{b}{a^2}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫ax+bx​dx​=∫tat−b​​adt​=a21​∫tt−b​dt=a21​∫dt−a2b​∫tdt​=a2t​−a2b​ln∣t∣+C=a2ax+b​−a2b​ln∣ax+b∣+C​

4.∫x2ax+bdx=1a3[12(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b)+b2⋅ln⁡∣ax+b∣]+C\begin{aligned} 4. \int\frac{x^2}{ax+b}dx=\frac{1}{a^3}\left[\frac{1}{2}(ax+b)^2-2b(ax+b)+b^2\cdot\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert\right]+C \end{aligned} 4.∫ax+bx2​dx=a31​[21​(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b)+b2⋅ln∣ax+b∣]+C​

证明：

∫x2ax+bdx=1a2∫a2x2ax+bdx=1a2∫a2x2+2abx+b2−2abx−b2ax+bdx=1a2∫(ax+b)2−2b⋅(ax+b−b)−b2ax+bdx=1a2∫(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b)+b2ax+bdx=1a2∫(ax+b)dx−2ba2∫dx+b2a2∫dxax+b=1a2∫(ax+b)dx−2ba2∫dx+b2a3∫d(ax+b)ax+b=x22a+bxa2−2bxa2+b2a3ln⁡∣ax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x^2}{ax+b}dx &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{a^2x^2}{ax+b}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{a^2x^2+2abx+b^2-2abx-b^2}{ax+b}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{(ax+b)^2-2b\cdot(ax+b-b)-b^2}{ax+b}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{(ax+b)^2-2b(ax+b)+b^2}{ax+b}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int (ax+b)dx-\frac{2b}{a^2}\int dx+\frac{b^2}{a^2}\int\frac{dx}{ax+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int (ax+b)dx-\frac{2b}{a^2}\int dx+\frac{b^2}{a^3}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{ax+b}\\ &=\frac{x^2}{2a}+\frac{bx}{a^2}-\frac{2bx}{a^2}+\frac{b^2}{a^3}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫ax+bx2​dx​=a21​∫ax+ba2x2​dx=a21​∫ax+ba2x2+2abx+b2−2abx−b2​dx=a21​∫ax+b(ax+b)2−2b⋅(ax+b−b)−b2​dx=a21​∫ax+b(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b)+b2​dx=a21​∫(ax+b)dx−a22b​∫dx+a2b2​∫ax+bdx​=a21​∫(ax+b)dx−a22b​∫dx+a3b2​∫ax+bd(ax+b)​=2ax2​+a2bx​−a22bx​+a3b2​ln∣ax+b∣+C​

5.∫dxx(ax+b)=−1b⋅ln⁡∣ax+bx∣+C\begin{aligned} 5.\int \frac{dx}{x(ax+b)}=-\frac{1}{b}\cdot\ln\vert{\frac{ax+b}{x}}\vert+C \end{aligned} 5.∫x(ax+b)dx​=−b1​⋅ln∣xax+b​∣+C​

证明：

设 1x(ax+b)=Ax+Bax+b\frac{1}{x(ax+b)}=\frac{A}{x}+\frac{B}{ax+b}x(ax+b)1​=xA​+ax+bB​

则有：1=A(ax+b)+Bx=Ab+(Aa+B)x1=A(ax+b)+Bx=Ab+(Aa+B)x1=A(ax+b)+Bx=Ab+(Aa+B)x

{Ab=1Aa+B=0 ⟹ {A=1bB=−ab\begin{aligned} \begin{cases} Ab&=1\\ Aa+B&=0 \end{cases}\ \Longrightarrow\ \begin{cases} A&=\frac{1}{b}\\ B&=-\frac{a}{b} \end{cases} \end{aligned} {AbAa+B​=1=0​ ⟹ {AB​=b1​=−ba​​​

所以有：

∫dxx(ax+b)=∫(1bx−ab(ax+b))dx=1b∫dxx−ab∫dxax+b=1b∫dxx−1b∫d(ax+b)ax+b=1b(ln⁡∣x∣−ln⁡∣ax+b∣)+C=1bln⁡∣xax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x(ax+b)} &=\int\left(\frac{1}{bx}-\frac{a}{b(ax+b)}\right)dx\\ &=\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x}-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{ax+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x}-\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{ax+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{b}\left(\ln\vert{x}\vert-\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert\right)+C\\ &=\frac{1}{b}\ln\vert{\frac{x}{ax+b}}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫x(ax+b)dx​​=∫(bx1​−b(ax+b)a​)dx=b1​∫xdx​−ba​∫ax+bdx​=b1​∫xdx​−b1​∫ax+bd(ax+b)​=b1​(ln∣x∣−ln∣ax+b∣)+C=b1​ln∣ax+bx​∣+C​

6.∫dxx2(ax+b)=−1bx+ab2⋅ln⁡∣ax+bx∣+C\begin{aligned} 6.\int\frac{dx}{x^2(ax+b)}=-\frac{1}{bx}+\frac{a}{b^2}\cdot\ln\vert{\frac{ax+b}{x}}\vert+C \end{aligned} 6.∫x2(ax+b)dx​=−bx1​+b2a​⋅ln∣xax+b​∣+C​

证明：

设 1x2(ax+b)=Ax+Bx2+Cax+b\frac{1}{x^2(ax+b)}=\frac{A}{x}+\frac{B}{x^2}+\frac{C}{ax+b}x2(ax+b)1​=xA​+x2B​+ax+bC​

则有：1=Ax(ax+b)+B(ax+b)+Cx2=(Aa+C)x2+(Ab+Ba)x+Bb1=Ax(ax+b)+B(ax+b)+Cx^2=(Aa+C)x^2+(Ab+Ba)x+Bb1=Ax(ax+b)+B(ax+b)+Cx2=(Aa+C)x2+(Ab+Ba)x+Bb

{Aa+C=0Ab+Ba=0Bb=1 ⟹ {A=−ab2B=1bC=a2b2\begin{aligned} \begin{cases} Aa+C&=0\\ Ab+Ba&=0\\ Bb&=1 \end{cases}\ \Longrightarrow\ \begin{cases} A&=-\frac{a}{b^2}\\ B&=\frac{1}{b}\\ C&=\frac{a^2}{b^2} \end{cases} \end{aligned} ⎩⎨⎧​Aa+CAb+BaBb​=0=0=1​ ⟹ ⎩⎨⎧​ABC​=−b2a​=b1​=b2a2​​​

所以有：

∫dxx2(ax+b)=∫(−ab2x+1bx2+a2b2(ax+b))dx=−ab2∫dxx+1b∫dxx2+a2b2∫dxax+b=−ab2∫dxx+1b∫dxx2+ab2∫d(ax+b)ax+b=−ab2ln⁡∣x∣−1bx+ab2ln⁡∣ax+b∣+C=−1bx+ab2ln⁡∣ax+bx∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x^2(ax+b)} &=\int\left(-\frac{a}{b^2x}+\frac{1}{bx^2}+\frac{a^2}{b^2(ax+b)}\right)dx\\ &=-\frac{a}{b^2}\int\frac{dx}{x}+\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x^2}+\frac{a^2}{b^2}\int\frac{dx}{ax+b}\\ &=-\frac{a}{b^2}\int\frac{dx}{x}+\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x^2}+\frac{a}{b^2}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{ax+b}\\ &=-\frac{a}{b^2}\ln\vert{x}\vert-\frac{1}{bx}+\frac{a}{b^2}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+C\\ &=-\frac{1}{bx}+\frac{a}{b^2}\ln\vert{\frac{ax+b}{x}}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫x2(ax+b)dx​​=∫(−b2xa​+bx21​+b2(ax+b)a2​)dx=−b2a​∫xdx​+b1​∫x2dx​+b2a2​∫ax+bdx​=−b2a​∫xdx​+b1​∫x2dx​+b2a​∫ax+bd(ax+b)​=−b2a​ln∣x∣−bx1​+b2a​ln∣ax+b∣+C=−bx1​+b2a​ln∣xax+b​∣+C​

7.∫x(ax+b)2dx=1a2(ln⁡∣ax+b∣+bax+b)+C\begin{aligned} 7.\int\frac{x}{(ax+b)^2}dx=\frac{1}{a^2}\left(\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+\frac{b}{ax+b}\right)+C \end{aligned} 7.∫(ax+b)2x​dx=a21​(ln∣ax+b∣+ax+bb​)+C​

证明：

解法1：

设 x(ax+b)2=Aax+b+B(ax+b)2\frac{x}{(ax+b)^2}=\frac{A}{ax+b}+\frac{B}{(ax+b)^2}(ax+b)2x​=ax+bA​+(ax+b)2B​

则有：x=A(ax+b)+B=Aax+Ab+Bx=A(ax+b)+B=Aax+Ab+Bx=A(ax+b)+B=Aax+Ab+B

{Aa=1Ab+B=0 ⟹ {A=1aB=−ba\begin{aligned} \begin{cases} Aa&=1\\ Ab+B&=0 \end{cases}\ \Longrightarrow\ \begin{cases} A&=\frac{1}{a}\\ B&=-\frac{b}{a} \end{cases} \end{aligned} {AaAb+B​=1=0​ ⟹ {AB​=a1​=−ab​​​

所以有：

∫x(ax+b)2dx=∫(1a(ax+b)−ba(ax+b)2)dx=1a∫dxax+b−ba∫dx(ax+b)2=1a2∫d(ax+b)ax+b−ba2∫d(ax+b)(ax+b)2=1a2ln⁡∣ax+b∣+ba2⋅1ax+b+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x}{(ax+b)^2}dx &=\int\left(\frac{1}{a(ax+b)}-\frac{b}{a(ax+b)^2}\right)dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\int\frac{dx}{ax+b}-\frac{b}{a}\int\frac{dx}{(ax+b)^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{ax+b}-\frac{b}{a^2}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{(ax+b)^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+\frac{b}{a^2}\cdot\frac{1}{ax+b}+C\\ \end{aligned} ∫(ax+b)2x​dx​=∫(a(ax+b)1​−a(ax+b)2b​)dx=a1​∫ax+bdx​−ab​∫(ax+b)2dx​=a21​∫ax+bd(ax+b)​−a2b​∫(ax+b)2d(ax+b)​=a21​ln∣ax+b∣+a2b​⋅ax+b1​+C​

解法2：

∫x(ax+b)2dx=1a∫x(ax+b)2d(ax+b)=1a∫xd(1ax+b)=1a(xax+b−∫dxax+b)=xa(ax+b)−1a2∫d(ax+b)ax+b=xa(ax+b)−1a2ln⁡∣ax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x}{(ax+b)^2}dx &=\frac{1}{a}\int\frac{x}{(ax+b)^2}d(ax+b)\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\int xd\left(\frac{1}{ax+b}\right)\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\left(\frac{x}{ax+b}-\int\frac{dx}{ax+b}\right)\\ &=\frac{x}{a(ax+b)}-\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{ax+b}\\ &=\frac{x}{a(ax+b)}-\frac{1}{a^2}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫(ax+b)2x​dx​=a1​∫(ax+b)2x​d(ax+b)=a1​∫xd(ax+b1​)=a1​(ax+bx​−∫ax+bdx​)=a(ax+b)x​−a21​∫ax+bd(ax+b)​=a(ax+b)x​−a21​ln∣ax+b∣+C​

8.∫x2(ax+b)2dx=1a3(ax+b−2bln⁡∣ax+b∣−b2ax+b)+C\begin{aligned} 8.\int\frac{x^2}{(ax+b)^2}dx=\frac{1}{a^3}\left(ax+b-2b\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert-\frac{b^2}{ax+b}\right)+C \end{aligned} 8.∫(ax+b)2x2​dx=a31​(ax+b−2bln∣ax+b∣−ax+bb2​)+C​

证明：

∫x2(ax+b)2dx=1a2∫a2x2+2abx+b2−2abx−b2(ax+b)2dx=1a2∫(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b−b)−b2(ax+b)2dx=1a2∫(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b)+b2(ax+b)2dx=1a2∫dx−2ba2∫dxax+b+b2a2∫dx(ax+b)2=1a2∫dx−2ba3∫d(ax+b)ax+b+b2a3∫d(ax+b)(ax+b)2=xa2−2ba3ln⁡∣ax+b∣−b2a3⋅1ax+b+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x^2}{(ax+b)^2}dx &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{a^2x^2+2abx+b^2-2abx-b^2}{(ax+b)^2}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{(ax+b)^2-2b(ax+b-b)-b^2}{(ax+b)^2}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{(ax+b)^2-2b(ax+b)+b^2}{(ax+b)^2}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int dx-\frac{2b}{a^2}\int\frac{dx}{ax+b}+\frac{b^2}{a^2}\int\frac{dx}{(ax+b)^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int dx-\frac{2b}{a^3}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{ax+b}+\frac{b^2}{a^3}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{(ax+b)^2}\\ &=\frac{x}{a^2}-\frac{2b}{a^3}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert-\frac{b^2}{a^3}\cdot\frac{1}{ax+b}+C \end{aligned} ∫(ax+b)2x2​dx​=a21​∫(ax+b)2a2x2+2abx+b2−2abx−b2​dx=a21​∫(ax+b)2(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b−b)−b2​dx=a21​∫(ax+b)2(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b)+b2​dx=a21​∫dx−a22b​∫ax+bdx​+a2b2​∫(ax+b)2dx​=a21​∫dx−a32b​∫ax+bd(ax+b)​+a3b2​∫(ax+b)2d(ax+b)​=a2x​−a32b​ln∣ax+b∣−a3b2​⋅ax+b1​+C​

9.∫dxx(ax+b)2=1b(ax+b)−1b2⋅ln⁡∣ax+bx∣+C\begin{aligned} 9.\int\frac{dx}{x(ax+b)^2}=\frac{1}{b(ax+b)}-\frac{1}{b^2}\cdot\ln\vert{\frac{ax+b}{x}}\vert+C \end{aligned} 9.∫x(ax+b)2dx​=b(ax+b)1​−b21​⋅ln∣xax+b​∣+C​

证明：

设 1x(ax+b)2=Ax+Bax+b+C(ax+b)2\frac{1}{x(ax+b)^2}=\frac{A}{x}+\frac{B}{ax+b}+\frac{C}{(ax+b)^2}x(ax+b)21​=xA​+ax+bB​+(ax+b)2C​

则有：1=A(ax+b)2+Bx(ax+b)+Cx=(Aa2+Ba)x2+(2Aab+Bb+C)x+Ab21=A(ax+b)^2+Bx(ax+b)+Cx=(Aa^2+Ba)x^2+(2Aab+Bb+C)x+Ab^21=A(ax+b)2+Bx(ax+b)+Cx=(Aa2+Ba)x2+(2Aab+Bb+C)x+Ab2

{Aa2+Ba=02Aab+Bb+C=0Ab2=1 ⟹ {A=1b2B=−ab2C=−ab\begin{aligned} \begin{cases} Aa^2+Ba&=0\\ 2Aab+Bb+C&=0\\ Ab^2&=1\\ \end{cases}\ \Longrightarrow\ \begin{cases} A&=\frac{1}{b^2}\\ B&=-\frac{a}{b^2}\\ C&=-\frac{a}{b} \end{cases} \end{aligned} ⎩⎨⎧​Aa2+Ba2Aab+Bb+CAb2​=0=0=1​ ⟹ ⎩⎨⎧​ABC​=b21​=−b2a​=−ba​​​

所以有：

∫dxx(ax+b)2=∫(1b2x−ab2(ax+b)−ab(ax+b)2)dx=1b2∫dxx−ab2∫dx(ax+b)−ab∫dx(ax+b)2=1b2∫dxx−1b2∫d(ax+b)(ax+b)−1b∫d(ax+b)(ax+b)2=1b2ln⁡∣x∣−1b2ln⁡∣ax+b∣+1b⋅1ax+b+C=1b(ax+b)+1b2ln⁡∣xax+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x(ax+b)^2} &=\int\left(\frac{1}{b^2x}-\frac{a}{b^2(ax+b)}-\frac{a}{b(ax+b)^2}\right)dx\\ &=\frac{1}{b^2}\int\frac{dx}{x}-\frac{a}{b^2}\int\frac{dx}{(ax+b)}-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{(ax+b)^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{b^2}\int\frac{dx}{x}-\frac{1}{b^2}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{(ax+b)}-\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{d(ax+b)}{(ax+b)^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{b^2}\ln\vert{x}\vert-\frac{1}{b^2}\ln\vert{ax+b}\vert+\frac{1}{b}\cdot\frac{1}{ax+b}+C\\ &=\frac{1}{b(ax+b)}+\frac{1}{b^2}\ln\vert{\frac{x}{ax+b}}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫x(ax+b)2dx​​=∫(b2x1​−b2(ax+b)a​−b(ax+b)2a​)dx=b21​∫xdx​−b2a​∫(ax+b)dx​−ba​∫(ax+b)2dx​=b21​∫xdx​−b21​∫(ax+b)d(ax+b)​−b1​∫(ax+b)2d(ax+b)​=b21​ln∣x∣−b21​ln∣ax+b∣+b1​⋅ax+b1​+C=b(ax+b)1​+b21​ln∣ax+bx​∣+C​

含有 ax+b\sqrt{ax+b}ax+b​ 的积分

10.∫ax+b dx=23a(ax+b)3+C\begin{aligned} 10.\int\sqrt{ax+b}\ dx=\frac{2}{3a}\sqrt{(ax+b)^3}+C \end{aligned} 10.∫ax+b​ dx=3a2​(ax+b)3​+C​

证明：

解法1：

15.∫dxxax+b={1b⋅ln⁡∣ax+b−bax+b+b∣+C(b>0)2−b⋅arctan⁡ax+b−b+C(b<0)\begin{aligned} 15.\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}}= \begin{cases} \frac{1}{\sqrt{b}}\cdot\ln\vert{\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}-\sqrt{b}}{\sqrt{ax+b}+\sqrt{b}}}\vert+C &(b>0)\\ \frac{2}{\sqrt{-b}}\cdot\arctan\sqrt{\frac{ax+b}{-b}}+C &(b<0)\\ \end{cases} \end{aligned} 15.∫xax+b​dx​=⎩⎨⎧​b​1​⋅ln∣ax+b​+b​ax+b​−b​​∣+C−b​2​⋅arctan−bax+b​​+C​(b>0)(b<0)​​

证明：
设 ax+b=t\sqrt{ax+b}=tax+b​=t 则有 x=t2−bax=\frac{t^2-b}{a}x=at2−b​， dx=2tadtdx=\frac{2t}{a}dtdx=a2t​dt

∫dxxax+b=∫at(t2−b)2tadt=∫2t2−bdt\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}} &=\int\frac{a}{t(t^2-b)}\frac{2t}{a}dt\\ &=\int\frac{2}{t^2-b}dt \end{aligned} ∫xax+b​dx​​=∫t(t2−b)a​a2t​dt=∫t2−b2​dt​

1、当 b>0b>0b>0 时：

∫2t2−bdt==2∫1t2−(b)2dt=1b∫(1t−b−1t+b)dt=1b(∫dtt−b−∫dtt+b)=1b(∫d(t−b)t−b−∫d(t+b)t+b)=1b(ln⁡∣t−b∣−ln⁡∣t+b∣)+C=1bln⁡∣t−bt+b∣+C=1bln⁡∣ax+b−bax+b+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{2}{t^2-b}dt= &=2\int\frac{1}{t^2-(\sqrt{b})^2}dt\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b}}\int\left(\frac{1}{t-\sqrt{b}}-\frac{1}{t+\sqrt{b}}\right)dt\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b}}\left(\int\frac{dt}{t-\sqrt{b}}-\int\frac{dt}{t+\sqrt{b}}\right)\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b}}\left(\int\frac{d(t-\sqrt{b})}{t-\sqrt{b}}-\int\frac{d(t+\sqrt{b})}{t+\sqrt{b}}\right)\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b}}\left(\ln\vert{t-\sqrt{b}}\vert-\ln\vert{t+\sqrt{b}}\vert\right)+C\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b}}\ln\vert{\frac{t-\sqrt{b}}{t+\sqrt{b}}}\vert+C\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b}}\ln\vert{\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}-\sqrt{b}}{\sqrt{ax+b}+\sqrt{b}}}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫t2−b2​dt=​=2∫t2−(b​)21​dt=b​1​∫(t−b​1​−t+b​1​)dt=b​1​(∫t−b​dt​−∫t+b​dt​)=b​1​(∫t−b​d(t−b​)​−∫t+b​d(t+b​)​)=b​1​(ln∣t−b​∣−ln∣t+b​∣)+C=b​1​ln∣t+b​t−b​​∣+C=b​1​ln∣ax+b​+b​ax+b​−b​​∣+C​

2、当 b<0b<0b<0 时：

∫2t2−bdt=2∫1t2+(−b)2dt=−2b∫1t2(−b)2+1dt=2−b∫1t2(−b)2+1d(t−b)=2−barctan⁡t−b+C=2−barctan⁡ax+b−b+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{2}{t^2-b}dt &=2\int\frac{1}{t^2+(\sqrt{-b})^2}dt\\ &=-\frac{2}{b}\int\frac{1}{\frac{t^2}{(\sqrt{-b})^2}+1}dt\\ &=\frac{2}{\sqrt{-b}}\int\frac{1}{\frac{t^2}{(\sqrt{-b})^2}+1}d(\frac{t}{\sqrt{-b}})\\ &=\frac{2}{\sqrt{-b}}\arctan\frac{t}{\sqrt{-b}}+C\\ &=\frac{2}{\sqrt{-b}}\arctan\sqrt{\frac{ax+b}{-b}}+C \end{aligned} ∫t2−b2​dt​=2∫t2+(−b​)21​dt=−b2​∫(−b​)2t2​+11​dt=−b​2​∫(−b​)2t2​+11​d(−b​t​)=−b​2​arctan−b​t​+C=−b​2​arctan−bax+b​​+C​

16.∫dxx2ax+b=−ax+bbx−a2b∫dxxax+b\begin{aligned} 16.\int\frac{dx}{x^2\sqrt{ax+b}}=-\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{bx}-\frac{a}{2b}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}} \end{aligned} 16.∫x2ax+b​dx​=−bxax+b​​−2ba​∫xax+b​dx​​

证明：

设 1x2ax+b=Axax+b+Bax+bx2\frac{1}{x^2\sqrt{ax+b}}=\frac{A}{x\sqrt{ax+b}}+\frac{B\sqrt{ax+b}}{x^2}x2ax+b​1​=xax+b​A​+x2Bax+b​​

则有：

{A+Ba=0Bb=1 ⟹ {A=−abB=1b\begin{aligned} \begin{cases} A+Ba&=0\\ Bb&=1 \end{cases}\ \Longrightarrow\ \begin{cases} A&=-\frac{a}{b}\\ B&=\frac{1}{b} \end{cases} \end{aligned} {A+BaBb​=0=1​ ⟹ {AB​=−ba​=b1​​​

所以：

∫dxx2ax+b=∫(−abxax+b+ax+bbx2)dx=−ab∫dxxax+b+1b∫ax+bx2dx=−ab∫dxxax+b−1b∫ax+b d1x=−ab∫dxxax+b−ax+bbx+1b∫1xdax+b=−ab∫dxxax+b−ax+bbx+a2b∫dxxax+b=−ax+bbx−a2b∫dxxax+b\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x^2\sqrt{ax+b}} &=\int\left(-\frac{a}{bx\sqrt{ax+b}}+\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{bx^2}\right)dx\\ &=-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}}+\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x^2}dx\\ &=-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}}-\frac{1}{b}\int\sqrt{ax+b}\ d\frac{1}{x}\\ &=-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}}-\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{bx}+\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{1}{x}d\sqrt{ax+b}\\ &=-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}}-\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{bx}+\frac{a}{2b}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}}\\ &=-\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{bx}-\frac{a}{2b}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}} \end{aligned} ∫x2ax+b​dx​​=∫(−bxax+b​a​+bx2ax+b​​)dx=−ba​∫xax+b​dx​+b1​∫x2ax+b​​dx=−ba​∫xax+b​dx​−b1​∫ax+b​ dx1​=−ba​∫xax+b​dx​−bxax+b​​+b1​∫x1​dax+b​=−ba​∫xax+b​dx​−bxax+b​​+2ba​∫xax+b​dx​=−bxax+b​​−2ba​∫xax+b​dx​​

17.∫ax+bxdx=2ax+b+b∫dxxax+b\begin{aligned} 17.\int\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x}dx=2\sqrt{ax+b}+b\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}} \end{aligned} 17.∫xax+b​​dx=2ax+b​+b∫xax+b​dx​​

证明：

设 ax+b=t\sqrt{ax+b}=tax+b​=t 则有 x=t2−bax=\frac{t^2-b}{a}x=at2−b​， dx=2tadtdx=\frac{2t}{a}dtdx=a2t​dt

所以有：

∫ax+bxdx=∫att2−b2tadt=2∫t2−b+bt2−bdt=2∫dt+2b∫dtt2−b=2t+2b∫dtt2−b=2ax+b+b∫dxxax+b\begin{aligned} \int\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x}dx &=\int\frac{at}{t^2-b}\frac{2t}{a}dt\\ &=2\int\frac{t^2-b+b}{t^2-b}dt\\ &=2\int dt+2b\int\frac{dt}{t^2-b}\\ &=2t+2b\int\frac{dt}{t^2-b}\\ &=2\sqrt{ax+b}+b\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}} \end{aligned} ∫xax+b​​dx​=∫t2−bat​a2t​dt=2∫t2−bt2−b+b​dt=2∫dt+2b∫t2−bdt​=2t+2b∫t2−bdt​=2ax+b​+b∫xax+b​dx​​

18.∫ax+bx2dx=−ax+bx+a2∫dxxax+b\begin{aligned} 18.\int\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x^2}dx=-\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x}+\frac{a}{2}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}} \end{aligned} 18.∫x2ax+b​​dx=−xax+b​​+2a​∫xax+b​dx​​

证明：

∫ax+bx2dx=−∫ax+b1x=−ax+bx+∫dax+bx=−ax+bx+a2∫dxxax+b\begin{aligned} \int\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x^2}dx &=-\int\sqrt{ax+b}\frac{1}{x}\\ &=-\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x}+\int\frac{d\sqrt{ax+b}}{x}\\ &=-\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x}+\frac{a}{2}\int\frac{dx}{x\sqrt{ax+b}} \end{aligned} ∫x2ax+b​​dx​=−∫ax+b​x1​=−xax+b​​+∫xdax+b​​=−xax+b​​+2a​∫xax+b​dx​​

含有 x2±a2x^2\pm a^2x2±a2 的积分

19.∫dxx2+a2=1aarctan⁡xa+C\begin{aligned} 19.\int\frac{dx}{x^2+a^2}=\frac{1}{a}\arctan\frac{x}{a}+C \end{aligned} 19.∫x2+a2dx​=a1​arctanax​+C​

证明：
解法1：

∫dxx2+a2=1a2∫1(xa)2+1dx=1a∫1(xa)2+1dxa=1aarctan⁡xa+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x^2+a^2} &=\frac{1}{a^2}\int\frac{1}{(\frac{x}{a})^2+1}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\int\frac{1}{(\frac{x}{a})^2+1}d\frac{x}{a}\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\arctan\frac{x}{a}+C \end{aligned} ∫x2+a2dx​​=a21​∫(ax​)2+11​dx=a1​∫(ax​)2+11​dax​=a1​arctanax​+C​

解法2：

设 x=atan⁡tx=a\tan tx=atant 则 dx=asec⁡2t dtdx=a\sec^2t\ dtdx=asec2t dt

∫dxx2+a2=∫asec⁡2ta2tan⁡2t+a2dt=∫asec⁡2ta2sec⁡2tdt=1a∫dt=1at+C=1aarctan⁡xa+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x^2+a^2} &=\int\frac{a\sec^2t}{a^2\tan^2t+a^2}dt\\ &=\int\frac{a\sec^2t}{a^2\sec^2t}dt\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\int dt\\ &=\frac{1}{a}t+C\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\arctan\frac{x}{a}+C \end{aligned} ∫x2+a2dx​​=∫a2tan2t+a2asec2t​dt=∫a2sec2tasec2t​dt=a1​∫dt=a1​t+C=a1​arctanax​+C​

20.∫dx(x2+a2)n=x2(n−1)a2(x2+a2)n−1+2n−32(n−1)a2∫dx(x2+a2)n−1\begin{aligned} 20.\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^n}=\frac{x}{2(n-1)a^2(x^2+a^2)^{n-1}}+\frac{2n-3}{2(n-1)a^2}\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^{n-1}} \end{aligned} 20.∫(x2+a2)ndx​=2(n−1)a2(x2+a2)n−1x​+2(n−1)a22n−3​∫(x2+a2)n−1dx​​

证明：

∫dx(x2+a2)n=x(x2+a2)n−∫xd1(x2+a2)n=x(x2+a2)n+2n∫x2(x2+a2)n+1dx=x(x2+a2)n+2n∫x2+a2−a2(x2+a2)n+1dx=x(x2+a2)n+2n∫1(x2+a2)ndx−2na2∫1(x2+a2)n+1dx\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^n} &=\frac{x}{(x^2+a^2)^n}-\int xd\frac{1}{(x^2+a^2)^n}\\ &=\frac{x}{(x^2+a^2)^n}+2n\int\frac{x^2}{(x^2+a^2)^{n+1}}dx\\ &=\frac{x}{(x^2+a^2)^n}+2n\int\frac{x^2+a^2-a^2}{(x^2+a^2)^{n+1}}dx\\ &=\frac{x}{(x^2+a^2)^n}+2n\int\frac{1}{(x^2+a^2)^{n}}dx-2na^2\int\frac{1}{(x^2+a^2)^{n+1}}dx\\ \end{aligned} ∫(x2+a2)ndx​​=(x2+a2)nx​−∫xd(x2+a2)n1​=(x2+a2)nx​+2n∫(x2+a2)n+1x2​dx=(x2+a2)nx​+2n∫(x2+a2)n+1x2+a2−a2​dx=(x2+a2)nx​+2n∫(x2+a2)n1​dx−2na2∫(x2+a2)n+11​dx​

所以有：

∫dx(x2+a2)n=x(x2+a2)n+2n∫dx(x2+a2)n−2na2∫dx(x2+a2)n+1(1−2n)∫dx(x2+a2)n=x(x2+a2)n−2na2∫dx(x2+a2)n+12n−12na2∫dx(x2+a2)n+12na2x(x2+a2)n=∫dx(x2+a2)n+1\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^n}&=\frac{x}{(x^2+a^2)^n}+2n\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^{n}}-2na^2\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^{n+1}}\\ (1-2n)\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^n}&=\frac{x}{(x^2+a^2)^n}-2na^2\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^{n+1}}\\ \frac{2n-1}{2na^2}\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^n}+\frac{1}{2na^2}\frac{x}{(x^2+a^2)^n}&=\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^{n+1}} \end{aligned} ∫(x2+a2)ndx​(1−2n)∫(x2+a2)ndx​2na22n−1​∫(x2+a2)ndx​+2na21​(x2+a2)nx​​=(x2+a2)nx​+2n∫(x2+a2)ndx​−2na2∫(x2+a2)n+1dx​=(x2+a2)nx​−2na2∫(x2+a2)n+1dx​=∫(x2+a2)n+1dx​​

令 n+1=nn+1=nn+1=n 得：

∫dx(x2+a2)n=2n−32(n−1)a2∫dx(x2+a2)n−1+12(n−1)a2x(x2+a2)n−1\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^{n}} &=\frac{2n-3}{2(n-1)a^2}\int\frac{dx}{(x^2+a^2)^{n-1}}+\frac{1}{2(n-1)a^2}\frac{x}{(x^2+a^2)^{n-1}} \end{aligned} ∫(x2+a2)ndx​​=2(n−1)a22n−3​∫(x2+a2)n−1dx​+2(n−1)a21​(x2+a2)n−1x​​

21.∫dxx2−a2=12aln⁡∣x−ax+a∣+C\begin{aligned} 21.\int\frac{dx}{x^2-a^2}=\frac{1}{2a}\ln\vert{\frac{x-a}{x+a}}\vert+C \end{aligned} 21.∫x2−a2dx​=2a1​ln∣x+ax−a​∣+C​

证明：

∫dxx2−a2=12a∫(1x−a−1x+a)dx=12a∫d(x−a)x−a−12a∫d(x+a)x+a=12aln⁡∣x−a∣−12aln⁡∣x+a∣+C=12aln⁡∣x−ax+a∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x^2-a^2} &=\frac{1}{2a}\int\left(\frac{1}{x-a}-\frac{1}{x+a}\right)dx\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{d(x-a)}{x-a}-\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{d(x+a)}{x+a}\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\ln\vert{x-a}\vert-\frac{1}{2a}\ln\vert{x+a}\vert+C\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\ln\vert{\frac{x-a}{x+a}}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫x2−a2dx​​=2a1​∫(x−a1​−x+a1​)dx=2a1​∫x−ad(x−a)​−2a1​∫x+ad(x+a)​=2a1​ln∣x−a∣−2a1​ln∣x+a∣+C=2a1​ln∣x+ax−a​∣+C​

含有 ax2+b (a>0)ax^2+b\ (a>0)ax2+b (a>0) 的积分

22.∫dxax2+b={1abarctan⁡ab⋅x+C(b>0)12−abln⁡∣a⋅x−−ba⋅x+−b∣+C(b<0) (a>0)\begin{aligned} 22.\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b}= \begin{cases} \frac{1}{\sqrt{ab}}\arctan\sqrt{\frac{a}{b}}\cdot x+C&(b>0)\\ \frac{1}{2\sqrt{-ab}}\ln\vert{\frac{\sqrt{a}\cdot x-\sqrt{-b}}{\sqrt{a}\cdot x+\sqrt{-b}}}\vert+C&(b<0) \end{cases} \ (a>0) \end{aligned} 22.∫ax2+bdx​={ab​1​arctanba​​⋅x+C2−ab​1​ln∣a​⋅x+−b​a​⋅x−−b​​∣+C​(b>0)(b<0)​ (a>0)​

证明：

1、当 b>0b>0b>0 时

∫dxax2+b=1a∫dxx2+(ba)2=1aab∫1(xba)2+1dxba=1abarctan⁡ab⋅x+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b} &=\frac{1}{a}\int\frac{dx}{x^2+(\sqrt{\frac{b}{a}})^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\sqrt{\frac{a}{b}}\int\frac{1}{({\frac{x}{\sqrt{\frac{b}{a}}}})^2+1}d\frac{x}{\sqrt{\frac{b}{a}}}\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{ab}}\arctan\sqrt{\frac{a}{b}}\cdot x+C \end{aligned} ∫ax2+bdx​​=a1​∫x2+(ab​​)2dx​=a1​ba​​∫(ab​​x​)2+11​dab​​x​=ab​1​arctanba​​⋅x+C​

2、当 b<0b<0b<0 时

∫dxax2+b=1a∫1x2−(−ba)2dx=1a12−ba∫(1x−−ba−1x+−ba)dx=12−abln⁡∣x−−bax+−ba∣+C=12−abln⁡∣a⋅x−−ba⋅x+−b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b} &=\frac{1}{a}\int\frac{1}{x^2-(\sqrt{-\frac{b}{a}})^2}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\frac{1}{2\sqrt{-\frac{b}{a}}}\int\left(\frac{1}{x-\sqrt{-\frac{b}{a}}}-\frac{1}{x+\sqrt{-\frac{b}{a}}}\right)dx\\ &=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{-ab}}\ln\vert{\frac{x-\sqrt{-\frac{b}{a}}}{x+\sqrt{-\frac{b}{a}}}}\vert+C\\ &=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{-ab}}\ln\vert{\frac{\sqrt{a}\cdot x-\sqrt{-b}}{\sqrt{a}\cdot x+\sqrt{-b}}}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫ax2+bdx​​=a1​∫x2−(−ab​​)21​dx=a1​2−ab​​1​∫⎝⎛​x−−ab​​1​−x+−ab​​1​⎠⎞​dx=2−ab​1​ln∣x+−ab​​x−−ab​​​∣+C=2−ab​1​ln∣a​⋅x+−b​a​⋅x−−b​​∣+C​

23.∫xax2+bdx=12aln⁡∣ax2+b∣+C (a>0)\begin{aligned} 23.\int\frac{x}{ax^2+b}dx=\frac{1}{2a}\ln\vert{ax^2+b}\vert+C \ (a>0) \end{aligned} 23.∫ax2+bx​dx=2a1​ln∣ax2+b∣+C (a>0)​

证明：

∫xax2+bdx=12∫dx2ax2+b=12a∫d(ax2+b)ax2+b=12aln⁡∣ax2+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x}{ax^2+b}dx &=\frac{1}{2}\int\frac{dx^2}{ax^2+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{d(ax^2+b)}{ax^2+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\ln\vert{ax^2+b}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫ax2+bx​dx​=21​∫ax2+bdx2​=2a1​∫ax2+bd(ax2+b)​=2a1​ln∣ax2+b∣+C​

24.∫x2ax2+bdx=xa−ba∫dxax2+b (a>0)\begin{aligned} 24.\int\frac{x^2}{ax^2+b}dx=\frac{x}{a}-\frac{b}{a}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b}\ (a>0) \end{aligned} 24.∫ax2+bx2​dx=ax​−ab​∫ax2+bdx​ (a>0)​

证明：

∫x2ax2+bdx=1a∫ax2+b−bax2+bdx=1a∫dx−ba∫dxax2+b=xa−ba∫dxax2+b\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x^2}{ax^2+b}dx &=\frac{1}{a}\int\frac{ax^2+b-b}{ax^2+b}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{a}\int dx-\frac{b}{a}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b}\\ &=\frac{x}{a}-\frac{b}{a}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b} \end{aligned} ∫ax2+bx2​dx​=a1​∫ax2+bax2+b−b​dx=a1​∫dx−ab​∫ax2+bdx​=ax​−ab​∫ax2+bdx​​

25.∫dxx(ax2+b)=12bln⁡x2∣ax2+b∣+C (a>0)\begin{aligned} 25.\int\frac{dx}{x(ax^2+b)}=\frac{1}{2b}\ln\frac{x^2}{\vert{ax^2+b}\vert}+C\ (a>0) \end{aligned} 25.∫x(ax2+b)dx​=2b1​ln∣ax2+b∣x2​+C (a>0)​

证明：

∫dxx(ax2+b)=∫xdxx2(ax2+b)=12∫dx2x2(ax2+b)\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x(ax^2+b)} &=\int\frac{xdx}{x^2(ax^2+b)}\\ &=\frac{1}{2}\int\frac{dx^2}{x^2(ax^2+b)} \end{aligned} ∫x(ax2+b)dx​​=∫x2(ax2+b)xdx​=21​∫x2(ax2+b)dx2​​

设 1x2(ax2+b)=Ax2+Bax2+b\frac{1}{x^2(ax^2+b)}=\frac{A}{x^2}+\frac{B}{ax^2+b}x2(ax2+b)1​=x2A​+ax2+bB​

则有： 1=A(ax2+b)+Bx2=(Aa+B)x2+Ab1=A(ax^2+b)+Bx^2=(Aa+B)x^2+Ab1=A(ax2+b)+Bx2=(Aa+B)x2+Ab

{Aa+B=0Ab=1 ⟹ {A=1bB=−ab\begin{aligned} \begin{cases} Aa+B&=0\\ Ab&=1\\ \end{cases}\ \Longrightarrow\ \begin{cases} A&=\frac{1}{b}\\ B&=-\frac{a}{b} \end{cases} \end{aligned} {Aa+BAb​=0=1​ ⟹ {AB​=b1​=−ba​​​

所以：

∫dxx(ax2+b)=12∫dx2x2(ax2+b)=12∫(1bx2−ab(ax2+b))dx2=12b∫dx2x2−a2b∫dx2ax2+b=12b∫dx2x2−12b∫d(ax2+b)ax2+b=12bln⁡x2−12bln⁡∣ax2+b∣+C=12bln⁡x2∣ax2+b∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x(ax^2+b)} &=\frac{1}{2}\int\frac{dx^2}{x^2(ax^2+b)}\\ &=\frac{1}{2}\int\left(\frac{1}{bx^2}-\frac{a}{b(ax^2+b)}\right)dx^2\\ &=\frac{1}{2b}\int\frac{dx^2}{x^2}-\frac{a}{2b}\int\frac{dx^2}{ax^2+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{2b}\int\frac{dx^2}{x^2}-\frac{1}{2b}\int\frac{d(ax^2+b)}{ax^2+b}\\ &=\frac{1}{2b}\ln x^2-\frac{1}{2b}\ln\vert{ax^2+b}\vert+C\\ &=\frac{1}{2b}\ln\frac{x^2}{\vert{ax^2+b}\vert}+C \end{aligned} ∫x(ax2+b)dx​​=21​∫x2(ax2+b)dx2​=21​∫(bx21​−b(ax2+b)a​)dx2=2b1​∫x2dx2​−2ba​∫ax2+bdx2​=2b1​∫x2dx2​−2b1​∫ax2+bd(ax2+b)​=2b1​lnx2−2b1​ln∣ax2+b∣+C=2b1​ln∣ax2+b∣x2​+C​

26.∫dxx2(ax2+b)=−1bx−ab∫dxax2+b (a>0)\begin{aligned} 26.\int\frac{dx}{x^2(ax^2+b)}=-\frac{1}{bx}-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b}\ (a>0) \end{aligned} 26.∫x2(ax2+b)dx​=−bx1​−ba​∫ax2+bdx​ (a>0)​

证明：

设 1x2(ax2+b)=Ax+Bx2+Cx+Dax2+b\frac{1}{x^2(ax^2+b)}=\frac{A}{x}+\frac{B}{x^2}+\frac{Cx+D}{ax^2+b}x2(ax2+b)1​=xA​+x2B​+ax2+bCx+D​

则有： 1=Ax(ax2+b)+B(ax2+b)+(Cx+D)x2=(Aa+C)x3+(Ba+D)x2+Abx+Bb1=Ax(ax^2+b)+B(ax^2+b)+(Cx+D)x^2=(Aa+C)x^3+(Ba+D)x^2+Abx+Bb1=Ax(ax2+b)+B(ax2+b)+(Cx+D)x2=(Aa+C)x3+(Ba+D)x2+Abx+Bb

{Aa+C=0Ba+D=0Ab=0Bb=1 ⟹ {A=0B=1bC=0D=−ab\begin{aligned} \begin{cases} Aa+C&=0\\ Ba+D&=0\\ Ab&=0\\ Bb&=1 \end{cases}\ \Longrightarrow\ \begin{cases} A&=0\\ B&=\frac{1}{b}\\ C&=0\\ D&=-\frac{a}{b}\\ \end{cases} \end{aligned} ⎩⎨⎧​Aa+CBa+DAbBb​=0=0=0=1​ ⟹ ⎩⎨⎧​ABCD​=0=b1​=0=−ba​​​

所以：

∫dxx2(ax2+b)=∫(1bx2−ab(ax2+b))dx=1b∫dxx2−ab∫dxax2+b=−1bx−ab∫dxax2+b\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x^2(ax^2+b)} &=\int\left(\frac{1}{bx^2}-\frac{a}{b(ax^2+b)}\right)dx\\ &=\frac{1}{b}\int\frac{dx}{x^2}-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b}\\ &=-\frac{1}{bx}-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b} \end{aligned} ∫x2(ax2+b)dx​​=∫(bx21​−b(ax2+b)a​)dx=b1​∫x2dx​−ba​∫ax2+bdx​=−bx1​−ba​∫ax2+bdx​​

27.∫dxx3(ax2+b)=a2b2ln⁡∣ax2+b∣x2−12bx2+C (a>0)\begin{aligned} 27.\int\frac{dx}{x^3(ax^2+b)}=\frac{a}{2b^2}\ln\frac{\vert{ax^2+b}\vert}{x^2}-\frac{1}{2bx^2}+C \ (a>0) \end{aligned} 27.∫x3(ax2+b)dx​=2b2a​lnx2∣ax2+b∣​−2bx21​+C (a>0)​

证明：

∫dxx3(ax2+b)=∫xdxx4(ax2+b)=12∫dx2x4(ax2+b)\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x^3(ax^2+b)} &=\int\frac{xdx}{x^4(ax^2+b)}\\ &=\frac{1}{2}\int\frac{dx^2}{x^4(ax^2+b)} \end{aligned} ∫x3(ax2+b)dx​​=∫x4(ax2+b)xdx​=21​∫x4(ax2+b)dx2​​

设 x2=tx^2=tx2=t

则有： 原式=12∫dtt2(at+b)=\frac{1}{2}\int\frac{dt}{t^2(at+b)}=21​∫t2(at+b)dt​

设 1t2(at+b)=At+Bt2+Cat+b\frac{1}{t^2(at+b)}=\frac{A}{t}+\frac{B}{t^2}+\frac{C}{at+b}t2(at+b)1​=tA​+t2B​+at+bC​

所以有： 1=At(at+b)+B(at+b)+Ct2=(Aa+C)t2+(Ab+Ba)t+Bb1=At(at+b)+B(at+b)+Ct^2=(Aa+C)t^2+(Ab+Ba)t+Bb1=At(at+b)+B(at+b)+Ct2=(Aa+C)t2+(Ab+Ba)t+Bb

{Aa+C=0Ab+Ba=0Bb=1 ⟹ {A=−ab2B=1bC=a2b2\begin{aligned} \begin{cases} Aa+C&=0\\ Ab+Ba&=0\\ Bb&=1 \end{cases}\ \Longrightarrow\ \begin{cases} A&=-\frac{a}{b^2}\\ B&=\frac{1}{b}\\ C&=\frac{a^2}{b^2} \end{cases} \end{aligned} ⎩⎨⎧​Aa+CAb+BaBb​=0=0=1​ ⟹ ⎩⎨⎧​ABC​=−b2a​=b1​=b2a2​​​

所以：

∫dxx3(ax2+b)=12∫dtt2(at+b)=12∫(−ab2t+1bt2+a2b2(at+b))dt=−a2b2∫dtt+12b∫dtt2+a22b2∫dtat+b=−a2b2∫dtt+12b∫dtt2+a2b2∫d(at+b)at+b=−a2b2ln⁡∣t∣−12bt+a2b2ln⁡∣at+b∣+C=a2b2ln⁡∣at+bt∣−12bt+C=a2b2ln⁡∣ax2+bx2∣−12bx2+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{x^3(ax^2+b)} &=\frac{1}{2}\int\frac{dt}{t^2(at+b)}\\ &=\frac{1}{2}\int\left(-\frac{a}{b^2t}+\frac{1}{bt^2}+\frac{a^2}{b^2(at+b)}\right)dt\\ &=-\frac{a}{2b^2}\int\frac{dt}{t}+\frac{1}{2b}\int\frac{dt}{t^2}+\frac{a^2}{2b^2}\int\frac{dt}{at+b}\\ &=-\frac{a}{2b^2}\int\frac{dt}{t}+\frac{1}{2b}\int\frac{dt}{t^2}+\frac{a}{2b^2}\int\frac{d(at+b)}{at+b}\\ &=-\frac{a}{2b^2}\ln\vert{t}\vert-\frac{1}{2bt}+\frac{a}{2b^2}\ln\vert{at+b}\vert+C\\ &=\frac{a}{2b^2}\ln\vert{\frac{at+b}{t}}\vert-\frac{1}{2bt}+C\\ &=\frac{a}{2b^2}\ln\vert{\frac{ax^2+b}{x^2}}\vert-\frac{1}{2bx^2}+C\\ \end{aligned} ∫x3(ax2+b)dx​​=21​∫t2(at+b)dt​=21​∫(−b2ta​+bt21​+b2(at+b)a2​)dt=−2b2a​∫tdt​+2b1​∫t2dt​+2b2a2​∫at+bdt​=−2b2a​∫tdt​+2b1​∫t2dt​+2b2a​∫at+bd(at+b)​=−2b2a​ln∣t∣−2bt1​+2b2a​ln∣at+b∣+C=2b2a​ln∣tat+b​∣−2bt1​+C=2b2a​ln∣x2ax2+b​∣−2bx21​+C​

28.∫dx(ax2+b)2=x2b(ax2+b)+12b∫dxax2+b (a>0)\begin{aligned} 28.\int\frac{dx}{(ax^2+b)^2}=\frac{x}{2b(ax^2+b)}+\frac{1}{2b}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b}\ (a>0) \end{aligned} 28.∫(ax2+b)2dx​=2b(ax2+b)x​+2b1​∫ax2+bdx​ (a>0)​

证明：

∫dx(ax2+b)2=∫xdxx(ax2+b)2=12a∫d(ax2+b)x(ax2+b)2=−12a∫1xd1ax2+b=−12ax(ax2+b)+12a∫1ax2+bd1x=−12ax(ax2+b)−12a∫dxx2(ax2+b)\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{(ax^2+b)^2} &=\int\frac{xdx}{x(ax^2+b)^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{d(ax^2+b)}{x(ax^2+b)^2}\\ &=-\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{1}{x}d\frac{1}{ax^2+b}\\ &=-\frac{1}{2ax(ax^2+b)}+\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{1}{ax^2+b}d\frac{1}{x}\\ &=-\frac{1}{2ax(ax^2+b)}-\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{dx}{x^2(ax^2+b)}\\ \end{aligned} ∫(ax2+b)2dx​​=∫x(ax2+b)2xdx​=2a1​∫x(ax2+b)2d(ax2+b)​=−2a1​∫x1​dax2+b1​=−2ax(ax2+b)1​+2a1​∫ax2+b1​dx1​=−2ax(ax2+b)1​−2a1​∫x2(ax2+b)dx​​

代入式子 26 的结论得到：

∫dx(ax2+b)2=−12ax(ax2+b)−12a(−1bx−ab∫dxax2+b)=x2b(ax2+b)+12b∫dxax2+b\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{(ax^2+b)^2} &=-\frac{1}{2ax(ax^2+b)}-\frac{1}{2a}\left(-\frac{1}{bx}-\frac{a}{b}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b}\right)\\ &=\frac{x}{2b(ax^2+b)}+\frac{1}{2b}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+b} \end{aligned} ∫(ax2+b)2dx​​=−2ax(ax2+b)1​−2a1​(−bx1​−ba​∫ax2+bdx​)=2b(ax2+b)x​+2b1​∫ax2+bdx​​

含有 ax2+bx+c (a>0)ax^2+bx+c\ (a>0)ax2+bx+c (a>0) 的积分

29.∫dxax2+bx+c={24ac−b2⋅arctan⁡2ax+b4ac+b2+C (b2<4ac)1b2−4ac⋅ln⁡∣2ax+b−b2−4ac2ax+b+b2−4ac∣+C (b2>4ac) (a>0)\begin{aligned} 29.\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+bx+c}= \begin{cases} \frac{2}{\sqrt{4ac-b^2}}\cdot\arctan\frac{2ax+b}{\sqrt{4ac+b^2}}+C\ &(b^2<4ac)\\ \frac{1}{\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}\cdot\ln\vert{\frac{2ax+b-\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2ax+b+\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}}\vert+C\ &(b^2>4ac) \end{cases} \ (a>0) \end{aligned} 29.∫ax2+bx+cdx​={4ac−b2​2​⋅arctan4ac+b2​2ax+b​+C b2−4ac​1​⋅ln∣2ax+b+b2−4ac​2ax+b−b2−4ac​​∣+C ​(b2<4ac)(b2>4ac)​ (a>0)​

证明：

将分母变形：

ax2+bx+c=a[(x+b2a)2+4ac−b24a2]=14a[(2ax+b)2+(4ac−b2)]\begin{aligned} ax^2+bx+c &=a\left[\left(x+\frac{b}{2a}\right)^2+\frac{4ac-b^2}{4a^2}\right] \\ &=\frac{1}{4a}\left[(2ax+b)^2+(4ac-b^2)\right]\\ \end{aligned} ax2+bx+c​=a[(x+2ab​)2+4a24ac−b2​]=4a1​[(2ax+b)2+(4ac−b2)]​

1、当 b2<4acb^2<4acb2<4ac 时

∫dxax2+bx+c=4a∫dx(2ax+b)2+(4ac−b2)=2∫d(2ax+b)(2ax+b)2+(4ac−b2)2=24ac−b2∫1(2ax+b4ac−b2)2+1d2ax+b4ac−b2=24ac−b2⋅arctan⁡2ax+b4ac−b2+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{ax^2+bx+c} &=4a\int\frac{dx}{(2ax+b)^2+(4ac-b^2)}\\ &=2\int\frac{d(2ax+b)}{(2ax+b)^2+(\sqrt{4ac-b^2})^2}\\ &=\frac{2}{\sqrt{4ac-b^2}}\int\frac{1}{(\frac{2ax+b}{\sqrt{4ac-b^2}})^2+1}d\frac{2ax+b}{\sqrt{4ac-b^2}} \\ &=\frac{2}{\sqrt{4ac-b^2}}\cdot\arctan\frac{2ax+b}{\sqrt{4ac-b^2}}+C \end{aligned} ∫ax2+bx+cdx​​=4a∫(2ax+b)2+(4ac−b2)dx​=2∫(2ax+b)2+(4ac−b2​)2d(2ax+b)​=4ac−b2​2​∫(4ac−b2​2ax+b​)2+11​d4ac−b2​2ax+b​=4ac−b2​2​⋅arctan4ac−b2​2ax+b​+C​

2、当 b2>4acb^2>4acb2>4ac 时

∫dxax2+bx+c=4a∫dx(2ax+b)2−(b2−4ac)=2∫d(2ax+b)(2ax+b)2−(b2−4ac)2=1b2−4ac∫(1(2ax+b)−b2−4ac−1(2ax+b)+b2−4ac)d(2ax+b)=1b2−4ac∫d(2ax+b−b2−4ac)(2ax+b)−b2−4ac−1b2−4ac∫d(2ax+b−b2+4ac)(2ax+b)−b2+4ac=1b2−4acln⁡∣2ax+b−b2−4ac2ax+b+b2−4ac∣+C\begin{aligned} \int\frac{dx}{ax^2+bx+c} &=4a\int\frac{dx}{(2ax+b)^2-(b^2-4ac)}\\ &=2\int\frac{d(2ax+b)}{(2ax+b)^2-(\sqrt{b^2-4ac})^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}\int\left(\frac{1}{(2ax+b)-\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}-\frac{1}{(2ax+b)+\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}\right)d(2ax+b)\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}\int\frac{d(2ax+b-\sqrt{b^2-4ac})}{(2ax+b)-\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}-\frac{1}{\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}\int\frac{d(2ax+b-\sqrt{b^2+4ac})}{(2ax+b)-\sqrt{b^2+4ac}}\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}\ln\vert{\frac{2ax+b-\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2ax+b+\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}}\vert+C \end{aligned} ∫ax2+bx+cdx​​=4a∫(2ax+b)2−(b2−4ac)dx​=2∫(2ax+b)2−(b2−4ac​)2d(2ax+b)​=b2−4ac​1​∫((2ax+b)−b2−4ac​1​−(2ax+b)+b2−4ac​1​)d(2ax+b)=b2−4ac​1​∫(2ax+b)−b2−4ac​d(2ax+b−b2−4ac​)​−b2−4ac​1​∫(2ax+b)−b2+4ac​d(2ax+b−b2+4ac​)​=b2−4ac​1​ln∣2ax+b+b2−4ac​2ax+b−b2−4ac​​∣+C​

30.∫xax2+bx+cdx=12a⋅ln⁡∣ax2+bx+c∣−b2a∫dxax2+bx+c (a>0)\begin{aligned} 30.\int\frac{x}{ax^2+bx+c}dx=\frac{1}{2a}\cdot\ln\vert{ax^2+bx+c}\vert-\frac{b}{2a}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+bx+c}\ (a>0) \end{aligned} 30.∫ax2+bx+cx​dx=2a1​⋅ln∣ax2+bx+c∣−2ab​∫ax2+bx+cdx​ (a>0)​

证明：

∫xax2+bx+cdx=12a∫2ax+b−bax2+bx+cdx=12a∫2ax+bax2+bx+cdx−b2a∫dxax2+bx+c=12a∫d(ax2+bx+c)ax2+bx+c−b2a∫dxax2+bx+c=12aln⁡∣ax2+bx+c∣−b2a∫dxax2+bx+c\begin{aligned} \int\frac{x}{ax^2+bx+c}dx &=\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{2ax+b-b}{ax^2+bx+c}dx\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{2ax+b}{ax^2+bx+c}dx-\frac{b}{2a}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+bx+c}\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\int\frac{d(ax^2+bx+c)}{ax^2+bx+c}-\frac{b}{2a}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+bx+c}\\ &=\frac{1}{2a}\ln\vert{ax^2+bx+c}\vert-\frac{b}{2a}\int\frac{dx}{ax^2+bx+c} \end{aligned} ∫ax2+bx+cx​dx​=2a1​∫ax2+bx+c2ax+b−b​dx=2a1​∫ax2+bx+c2ax+b​dx−2ab​∫ax2+bx+cdx​=2a1​∫ax2+bx+cd(ax2+bx+c)​−2ab​∫ax2+bx+cdx​=2a1​ln∣ax2+bx+c∣−2ab​∫ax2+bx+cdx​​
